Title: Relates to providing legislative oversight on the issuance of short-term liquidity financing
Summary: Relates to providing legislative oversight on the issuance of short-term liquidity financing.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 174 of the laws of 1968, constituting the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to providing legislative oversight on the issuance of short-term liquidity financing
